concept.shortdesc: The enables MQTT messages to be sent from one MQTT server either to another MQTT server, or to . You can define one or more source connections, one or more destination connections, and a set of forwarding rules.

section.title: Features
section.p: provides the following features as standard:

ul.li: Support for connections using TLSv1.2, TLSv1.1, or unsecured protocols
Use of multiple forwarders in one instance
Topic mapping from source to destination
Dynamic configuration changes by using REST APIs or configuration file changes
Status monitoring by using REST APIs

section.title: Runtime environment
section.p: The Bridge is delivered as an RPM and runs directly in a CentOS 7 or RHEL 7 64-bit environment. The Bridge can also run in a environment with images that are based on CentOS 7 or RHEL 7 64-bit libraries.

The Bridge requires a minimum of 1GB of memory and a minimum of two processing cores. The disk space required is at minimum 4 times the size of the memory. Extra memory is required for larger Bridge configurations.
